phrs.translation: 莎草纸, 纸草, 纸莎草书
莱因德数学纸草书, 兰德数学纸草书
林德手卷, 莱因德纸草书, 兰德纸草书, 莱茵德纸草书
莫斯科纸草书, 莫斯科纸草

sentences.sentence: This was extremely fortunate, since later on, the original papyrus scrolls disappeared.
sentences.translation: 这简直是非常幸运，因为后来，这一原始的纸莎草卷轴丢失了。

sentences.sentence: A depiction of the rising sun. Papyrus of Nodjmet, c. 1050 BC.
sentences.translation: 对旭日东升的描绘，来自于Nodjmet的纸莎草纸，约公元前1050年。

sentences.sentence: The papyrus was already beginning to crumble, so he did not dare touch it by hand.
sentences.translation: 这些纸草已经开始碎裂，所以他不敢用手去碰它们。
